channel.title: Release file is expired - E: Release file for https://deb.whonix.org/dists/stretch/InRelease is expired (invalid since …)
channel.description:
I'm getting for a few days when doing apt-get update that the release file is expired:
"E: Release file for https://deb.whonix.org/dists/stretch/InRelease is expired (invalid since ...). Updates for this repository will not be applied."
What is this?

item.title: Release file is expired - E: Release file for https://deb.whonix.org/dists/stretch/InRelease is expired (invalid since …)
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
Whonix 14 (Debian stretch based) is deprecated. Please upgrade to Whnix 15 (Debian buster based).

Whonix 15 has been Released News
Whonix: A High Security Method of Surfing the Internet Whonix is a desktop operating system designed for advanced security and privacy. Whonix mitigates the threat of common attack vectors while maintaining usability. Online anonymity is realized via fail-safe, automatic, and desktop-wide use of the Tor network. A heavily reconfigured Debian base is run inside multiple virtual machines, providing a substantial layer of protection from malware and IP address leaks. Commonly used applications ar…

Read full topic
